code: @Override protected JndiRegistry createRegistry() throws Exception {     JndiRegistry jndi = super.createRegistry().     jndi.bind("myPolicy", policy).     return jndi. }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:start").routeId("foo").routePolicyRef("myPolicy").to("mock:result").         }     }. }
